titleStmt.title: The great cicle of Easter containing a short rule. To knowe vppon what day of the month Easter day will fall, made for the vse of such as would without their booke readily find out, and declare as well Easter day, as the other moueable feastes in the yeere: the domincall [sic] letter, the epact the age of the moone, her shining and the course of the tide. With other necessarie tables to learne out the course of the yeere, / by Io, P. 1583. [...] Set foorth according to the Queenes iniunctiones.
titleStmt.author: Pett, John.

titleStmt.title: The great cicle of Easter containing a short rule. To knowe vppon what day of the month Easter day will fall, made for the vse of such as would without their booke readily find out, and declare as well Easter day, as the other moueable feastes in the yeere: the domincall [sic] letter, the epact the age of the moone, her shining and the course of the tide. With other necessarie tables to learne out the course of the yeere, / by Io, P. 1583. [...] Set foorth according to the Queenes iniunctiones.
titleStmt.author: Pett, John.

publicationStmt.publisher: By I[ohn] C[harlewood] for Thomas Butter [, and are to be solde at his shoppe neere to S. Augustines gate,

notesStmt.note: Printer's name from STC; bookseller's address and publication date from colophon of anr. ed. A variant (STC 19817.5) has colophon dated 1584 on D2v. On this edition, D2v is blank.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
